column5: Sierra Trading Post has Powell SSL and TMX fly rods on sale. There's an additional discount that ends tomorrow dropping the prices even further. It really is an amazing deal.  Couldn't resist so I bought 2 LOL!  Sierra is shipping the rods to the UPS store in Lewiston for me as well. I'll pick 'em up when I cross the border to fish.  You can get the additional discount by clicking here:  http://email.sierratradingpost.com/dm?id=FF74526B692ADB3BF255549843B57A7B   Anyhow, just thought I'd pass this along.
wow looks like an amazing deal ... I guess they only ship to the US
Dang, I can't hardly afford to save more money on fishing gear!  Dan

No they ship to Canada, it's just a lot more expensive.  It's pretty painless setting up an account for dropoff at a mailbox depot at a neighboring US border city though.  Takes 2 mins to set up an account.  If you ever cross the border for any reason just stop in and pick up your packages.
